message: Hi Bob, thanks for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a valuable item at a reasonable price.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm really interested in your product, but $180 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. Would you be willing to come down to $140?
Hi Bob, I understand that 180 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for 160.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $160 is still a bit too high for me. Let's split the difference - I'm willing to pay $150. What do you think?
Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go below 155. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I can offer you the product for 155.
